help.description: Show to you about bot info and commands.

option.description: Write bot command name to show info about it.

field1.name: About me:
field1.value:
>>> Hi👋🏻, I'm **[{username}]({invite}){ticket_emote}**
 I am a robot that has many features to manage your server and I can entertain you with entertainment commands or I can play music for you or if you are worried about tickets or giveaways and other things of your server, I can help you.{learn_emote} (I can do anything for you)

field2.name: My prefix:
field2.value:
>>> In here my prefix is: **"`{prefix}`"** 
 use for send help menu: **"`{prefix}help` or {cmd}"**

field3.name: How See Commands:
field3.value: >>> With selecting one of the options from the menu below you can see information about commands in those categories.

help.error1: **{error_emote}| It seems like `{command_name}` is not a valid command! Please try Again!**
help.error2:
> You are not allowed to run this Command

> **You need to be one of those guys: {owners}**
help.error3:
This message only for {user} and you can't use it.
for use components send this: "{cmd}"

embed2.author: {username} Help
embed2.footer: Requested by {user} • for more info use {prefix}help

invite.description: Invite the bot to your own guild.

embed.title: Invite Me To Your Guild
embed.description:
**[Invite Me]({link}) to your server by clicking on my profile, then clicking the 'Add to Server' button. 
Alternatively, you can click the button below to [invite me]({link}) to your server!**

general.cooldown: **{emote_alert}| Please wait {time} before reusing the `{command}` command!**
general.error: {emote_error}| I am missing the Permission to `EmbedLinks` in guild.
general.botpermissions:
{emote_x}| **I don't have permission to respond `{command}` command!! 
Permissions need: [{perms}]**
general.userpermissions:
{emote_error}| **You don't have  permission to use `{command}` command!! 
Permissions need: [{perms}]**

field1.name: About me:

field2.name: My prefix:

>>> In here my prefix is: **"`{prefix}`"** 
 use for send help menu: **"`{prefix}help` or {cmd}"**
